title: Foebreaker
content:
Foebreaker Very Rare 4~12 Damage 2d6+2Bludgeoning Lethal Weapon: This weapon ignores Bludgeoning Resistance. Weapon Enchantment +2 Main Hand OnlyTenacity: When you miss an attack, you deal Bludgeoning damage anyway. Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks: As heavy and opposed to nonsense as the wearied hammer of a sentencing magistrate. MaulTwo-Handed 4.5 480
